titleStmt.title: A most breefe manner of instruction, to the principles of Christian religion. By J.F.
titleStmt.author: J. F., fl. 1587.
Foxe, John, 1516-1587, attributed name.
Fielde, John, d. 1588, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Foxe; probably not in fact by him, but possibly by John Fielde.--STC.
Actual printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
